privacySubtitle: Your privacy is important to us
privacyIntro: We are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your information:
privacyPoint1: We only collect data necessary to improve your experience on our website.
privacyPoint2: We do not share your personal information with third parties under any circumstances.
privacyPoint3: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time.
privacyPoint4: Cookies are used to enhance functionality, but you can disable them in your browser settings.
privacyConclusion: If you have any questions about our privacy practices, feel free to contact us.
termsSubtitle: Please review the terms and conditions carefully.
termsPoint1: By submitting a recipe, you agree that the content may be shared publicly on the platform.
termsPoint2: All content must adhere to our community guidelines. Offensive or inappropriate content will be removed.
termsPoint3: Recipes and images you publish must be your original content or used with proper permission.
termsPoint4: We are not liable for any inaccuracies or issues that arise from following recipes on this platform.
termsFooter: If you have any questions about these terms, feel free to contact us.
